attributes.additional_details: I want the government to stop taxing any money earned on overtime, the working people get taxed on absolutely everything. Why punish us by taxing us on overtime, especially when a huge majority of us are doing overtime because we have to, to survive.
attributes.background: I want to petition for a ban on tax on any money earned during in overtime. we pay enough tax on everything already. The reason people do overtime is because we need that extra cash, but the amount of tax we pay often renders the overtime useless.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition: 

Don’t tax people on any overtime they work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701418
